work.end: as a Web Developer. Doing some cool stuff with React, NextJS, PHP and other cool stuff.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I'm a web developer with 2 years of work experience. I've worked with a lot of technologies, but I'm currently working with React and NextJS as a frontend developer. I also have experience with NodeJS, PHP, FirebirdSQL, PostgreSQL, Docker, AWS, among others.

personal.title: Personal
personal.description: I'm a 21 years old Brazilian guy. I'm a very curious person, I like to learn new things and I'm always looking for new challenges. I'm also a very calm person, I like to listen to people and I'm always trying to help others.
